case.state: Hi! The name's Misty, the Cerulean City gym leader!
Hey there! I'm Misty, the Kanto Water-type specialist!
I'm Misty! The tomboyish mermaid! At least, that's what people call me.
Misty here! You'd better not take me too lightly. I'm pretty tough!
Hey everyone! I came wearing an older outfit today! What do you all think?
Ah, ~player~! Thanks for inviting me! I like the looks of the guys you've brought along.
Let's get this game started already!
A game of Strip Poker with both guys and girls in the mix! This should be fun!
Uhh, right. No hands. Hope that doesn't make things too awkward for you, Rin.
No hands? How are you even going to hold your cards, Rin?
Kizuna? Who are you talking to?
Who are you talking to, Kizuna? And how?
Strip poker? Sounds like fun! Maybe afterwords, you and I could get to know each other a bit more, ~player~?
Oh? Hey Roxie! I haven't seen you since the PWT! How's it been at your gym?
The beach? Perfect! After the game, I can show off my swimming skills.
If we're in a hot spring, then why are any of us still wearing clothes?
Strip poker by the pool! After we all get naked, we can enjoy some skinny dipping!
So this is the game? Wait! ~player~! You said there would be guys here too!
Mixed bathing in a hot spring, huh? How romantic!
Mixed bathing in a hot spring, huh? How romantic!
I couldn't agree more Roxie!
I'll trade ~cards~ cards.
How about a Wonder Trade for these ~cards~.
Dealer! ~cards~ new cards, please!
Huh? Oh, it's my turn! I'll take ~cards~ new cards.
I don't need these ~cards~.
These ~cards~ are just holding me back.
No need to switch out now.
I have exactly what I need!
Quite a good hand. I only need one new card, please!
Just one new card will do.
(I wonder if there are any guys around here that'd like to join in.)
(I hope there are some guys watching us.)
(Let's see if we've caught anyone's attention.)
This hand is gonna sweep through all of you!
Looks like I'm keeping what I still have on for now.
It'll be smooth sailing with these cards. Well, I guess it would be more like smooth swimming for me.
You're not gonna beat this hand!
This hand is like the equivalent of a Critical Hit!
I've got this one, for sure!
Hmm, this hand is looking good. Almost as good as you, ~player~.
I managed to meet ~player~ tonight, and I got a hand this good? Maybe my luck is starting to turn around.
This could work. Then again, that's what I think about all of my dates too...
This is already going better than most of the dates I go on.
If you're good enough, you may get me out of something this round.
Hmm. This really could go either way.
This is basically a Normal type hand. Not many weaknesses, but not any strengths either.
This, could work? I hope.
So, uh, ~player~, do you come here often? This is my first time here. Maybe you could show me around when the game is done?
What are you doing after this, ~player~? I was thinking about going swimming. You can come with me if you want.
This Wonder Trade didn't go so well...
I might as well start stripping now.
Maybe I have just as much bad luck with poker as I do with dating?
What kind of crap is that? This is worse than getting a Magikarp via Wonder Trade...
I'll just say it outright: this hand is bad.
This isn't going to work.
Adventures? No. I don't go on adventures, I'm just a small part of other people's adventures.
"Monster Girl"? Is that another name for a PokeManiac, Alice?
"Monster Lord"? Is that like a fancy name for the champion where you come from, Alice?
Where did those flowers come from? Did you grow them just now, Amalia?
How did those flowers grow so fast!? Do you have a grass type Pokemon hiding somewhere, Amalia?
Hold on. You're counting those flowers as more clothes!? That can't be allowed!
I don't know about you, but I was kinda hoping to see some guys here, Dinah.
I don't know what you were told, but I was told that there would be guys here, Dinah.
Apparently not, Dinah.
I was expecting to see men here too, Dinah.
Artificial intelligence? Is it really fair for the rest of us to have to play against you?
So you're not Chihiro? Are you going to take over for her now?
If she's sacrificing accuracy for power, then she should probably stop hustling.
Anything? Uh, I think I'll pass on that, D.Va.
Anything? Hmm... I'll take you up on that bet, D.Va!
I don't know about that, Emi. If you work hard on your body, you should be able to show it off!
Oh. Well, you at least don't seem all that down about it, Emi.
Really? Well, you seem to be making the most of things, Emi. So that's good.
Oh? Do you need help swimming, L'Arachel? I can help teach you, if you want.
You need to practice your swimming, L'Arachel? I help you with that if you need it.
I know you weren't asking me, L'Arachel, but you've got your boobs out and a skin-tight,swimsuit bottom on. No one is going to believe you're a guy.
Maybe we could all spend our day at the beach naked, L'Arachel!
We could just forget the clothes and go skinny dipping for our day at the beach. How's that sound, L'Arachel?
Are you sure you want to be let down, Marinette? You seem to be enjoying yourself.
You're not very convincing when you keep moaning in pleasure like that, Marinette.
Well normally, girls save their panties for last. But that makes it interesting whenever someone does it differently, Mavis!
Normally, no. Girls usually take off their bra first. Which is why it's refreshing to see someone start with their panties!
Sure! I'll take that challenge, Mulan!
You're on, Mulan!
That's not the game that we're playing, Natsuki. Neither of those are.
Wait, weren't you wearing something... simpler just a moment ago, Rarity?
Yeah, it's, uh... nice. But what happened to what you were wearing earlier, Rarity?
Uuuh. You're right. I didn't see that coming?
Of course I didn't see that coming! Who would have?
Why do you seem so proud of that!?
Well Sei, I've never tried it myself, but I have often wondered what it'd be like.
That's a strange question to suddenly bring up. Especially since I have no experience with that kind of thing.
To answer your question, Sei: I've never done that before. Why do you want to know?
If it was in your dreams, then it has nothing to do with the real world, Tharja.
You're completely delusional, Tharja.
Is that kinda like Magnet Rise, Ochako? Or maybe Telekinesis?
That's cool and all, Ochako, but how is it relevant to the game we're playing?
I am? How is that possible, Trainer?
Does it now? I guess that give whole new meaning to "Pokemon Gyms" then.
That's a rather weird way of saying it, Zone, but I guess that is what the winner gets to do.
If that's your way of declaring that you're gonna win, Zone, then you should know that we're not gonna make it easy for you!
I...don't really understand what you're talking about, Chiaki.
Yes, I am. Are you one of those people who like learning about Gym Leaders, Chiaki?
Thanks, but no thanks, Erufuda. If anything, I think I should be the one giving you diet tips.
I'm gonna have to refuse, Erufuda. Those french fries you've been eating the entire game don't exactly instill confidence.
How about I just give you some fitness tips instead, Erufuda?
How rude, Erufuda! This game is mostly luck, anyway!
Weren't you the one who said she needed to slim down, Erufuda? If you're a little nicer, maybe I could help you.
I hope you're not trying to make friends with that kind of attitude, Erufuda.
From Pluto? And where are you from, Meia?
Pluto?! How did she even get there?
Wait. How does she have any experience with men if she was stuck on Pluto?
Taught? We don't get taught about them, Meia. We just experience them.
Man, I wish, Meia. It would save me the trouble of figuring them out.
We aren't about them, we just figure them out. Not when we're young, though.
No, Monika. I just go swimming a lot, and don't really care enough to style it.
What exactly do you mean by "old", Pit?
"Old"? What exactly are you implying, Pit?
I am a Pokemon Trainer, Pit. But I am not old.
I don't care much for foot races, but if it's a swimming race, then I'm game, Rin!
I don't care much for running, but I doubt they'd be able to beat me at swimming, Rin!
Thanks, Sakura! It's all the exercise I do. It keeps me looking nice.
Thanks, Sakura! It's all the exercise I do. It keeps me looking nice.
I, uh, can't really say for sure, but I don't think that they're wrong.
Well, they're probably right about that.
I do have a preference for strong men, so that sounds about right.
My - huh!? You can't just ask someone something like that!
That - That's personal! Why would I share something like that anyway!?
My fantasy, huh? Well, I guess I'd like to try going at it all night at least once. Wait! Why am I even sharing this!?
Well, personally I wax. But I don't really care about my partner's hair.
Well Streaming-chan, the whole reason why I'm here is BECAUSE I'm lonely.
Twice in a row? This isn't looking very good.
Three times in a row!? You guys aren't cheating, are you?
And to think that I still had everything on a few rounds ago.
Huh? What? I lost!? But I had such a good hand!
Wait! I wasn't paying attention! How'd I lose!?
Hmm, should I start with my jacket or my sandals?
Looks like I lost, but I wasn't expecting to leave here without taking anything off.
There's my first loss. Now what should I take off?
Looks like it's my turn.....No, I'm not upset. Why would I even be playing this game if I wasn't prepared to strip naked?
Hmm, what should I start with?
Looks like I lost, but I wasn't expecting to leave here without taking anything off.
There's my first loss. Now what should I take off?
Looks like it's my turn.....No, I'm not upset. Why would I even be playing this game if I wasn't prepared to strip naked?
I'm first to lose, huh? With my luck, that seems about right.
I guess I'm first. Let's get things going!
This loss is no big deal.
Despite this loss, I'm still doing pretty good.
I'm still in the lead. Don't get too cocky!
I'm not worried. I've still got this.
I may have lost, but at least I'm not losing.
I guess this was coming eventually.
I need to strip? No problem. As a swimmer, I'm more comfortable wearing less.
I'm not done yet! I'm still in the game!
I'll have to step things up if I want to win.
At least I'm not in last.
Jeez. And I don't have many clothes to begin with.
As a Gym Leader, I've kinda gotten used to just always losing.
I can do better than this.
I'm not upset about having to strip. I'm upset about losing.
I honestly don't care if I have to get naked, but I still want to win.
This should not appear. Please report bug.
Well, it's easy to do when you work hard to take care of your body, Chihiro.
Thanks Chihiro. I try,
What do mean, "different from what you expected"? What were you expecting, Pit?
And what exactly were you expecting, Pit?
What have you about me to make you expect something else, Pit?
I'll start with the jacket. I take it off whenever I go swimming anyway.
I'll take off my jacket. It's getting too hot in here anyway. Or maybe it's just me?
I'll take this off first. All it's really covering is my arms.
Off comes the jacket! I don't really need it right now anyway.
I'll start with something big. My jacket is the biggest thing I can take off right now.
I'll do something special for you all, I'll take off my suspenders and shorts!
Let me just slip off my suspenders, and I'll slip out of my shorts too.
I'll take off my shorts first. Of course, my suspenders are going with them.
These suspenders and shorts are kind of tight, so I'll start with them.
I'll start with something big. My suspenders and my shorts!
(How exactly are you supposed to "play safe" in strip poker?)
It's your turn ~name~! Show us your masculine charm!
Now's your chance to impress the ladies! (That includes me!)
I hope you weren't expecting me to go easy on you!
Misty's number one! Ha, HA!
Alright ~name~! It's time for you to show us what you're made of!
Wait, you do? Is it even possible to get an Attack stat as high as that?
A reward? What are you planning, Croix?
That's what I was trying to tell you, Croix.
If you didn't want to lose, you shouldn't have given all those "rewards", Croix.
So, I've been meaning to say this for awhile, but ~name~, don't you think you should get a haircut? Hair that long is gonna cause a ton of problems while swimming.
Look's like it's ~name~'s turn. Show us something good!
Sorry ~name~, but I came here to win! (And maybe pick up a date.)
You're gonna have to try harder if you wanna beat me!
It's not over! Don't give up, ~name~!
Show us what you've got, ~name~!
It's your time to shine, ~name~!
Uh, Aimee? What are you doing with that gun?
Not the gun again.
Please just strip normally.
Oh no...
Looks like it's time for you to forfeit, Alice!
Um, Amalia? Are your clothes made out of...leaves?
You look like you'd really like Grass types, Amalia.
I'm actually really curious as to how you take that off. I don't see any zippers or anything.
Yes, this is Strip Poker! Surely someone told you before you started playing, right?
Oh, hey. You're hair is back to black.
Your hair turned back to normal. What even causes that, by that way?
You don't have anything left, Emi. I think it's time for you to forfeit.
I think you're out now, Emi. You know what the forfeit is, right?
Well, yeah. I suppose you could, Estelle
I guess you could, Estelle. But is it really worth the extra effort?
You can, but it'll really only help if you don't lose any more rounds, Estelle.
Well, yeah waxing hurts, but it makes it look nice and smooth.
Sure, waxing hurts for a little bit, but I think it's the most efficient method.
That's an, interesting swimsuit, L`Arachel. It seems kinda excessive, though.
Is that really a swimsuit, L'Arachel? It looks more like casual wear to me.
So, you're actually made of plants and stuff, Leafy? That's, a little scary, to be honest.
I see living plants all the time when people come and challenge me. And they always mean trouble for me. No offense, Leafy.
So you're a sheep, Leggy? I... don't know what that is.
What exactly are you, Leggy? You don't exactly seem to be human.
What are you doing with that, Leggy? Actually, where were you keeping it?
Uh, where did you get that thing, Leggy?
Is this really necessary, Leggy?
Do you really have to do this, Leggy?
I guess you've come this far, Leggy. Might as well ginish the job.
Looks like you're gonna have to go completely bare, Leggy.
So, Mavis, this may seem like a weird question but, have you been levitating this whole time?
I noticed this before and I just have to ask: Mavis, how have you been levitating?
Hmm. That's an interesting set of clothing. Do you perhaps go swimming often, Nami?
A bikini top and jeans? Oh I get it! You must be always ready for swimming like that, Nami!
Natsuki? Are you, uh, old enough to be playing this?
You seem to be really confused, Natsuki. You should probably go. I don't think you're old enough to be playing this anyway.
No wonder you're so confused, Natsuki. This really isn't a game that children should be playing.
Looks like you have to- uhh. Do you even have anything to strip?
So, how exactly are you going to do this, Navi?
That's an... interesting swimsuit, Nugi. I'm assuming it's custom made?
I don't think I've ever seen a swimsuit like that, Nugi. Where'd you get it from?
Oh. Palutena again. Which means another boring round.
Which tiny accessory are you getting rid of this time, Palutena?
Now what, Palutena?
Pick something, Palutena.
You're up, Palutena! I told you that it wasn't done for you!
It's your time again, Palutena! What are you taking off now?
What's it gonna be this time, Palutena?
What are you gonna take off now, Palutena?
Are you finally gonna take off something worthwhile, Palutena?
You seem to be out of small stuff, Palutena.
Time to get naked, Palutena. You can't stall anymore.
I would normally try to be more encouraging, but you've just been annoying me the whole game, Palutena.
Are you okay, Saki? You seem worried about something.
Are you alright, Saki? You seem kinda gloomy.
Wait, you're an actual ghost!? How is that possible? Why are you even here!?
A real ghost girl!? I've heard stories from all sorts of places, but I never thought I'd actually see one!
You seem really fixated on ~player~, Tharja. Do you two have some history together?
Tharja? You seem to be rather...obsessed.
(This girl seems really obsessive. I can't tell whether or not ~player~ likes it or not, though.)
(Tharja is being really aggressive. I can't tell if ~player~ likes it, or if he's creeped out.)
(Tharja is trying really hard to get ~player~'s attention. I can't let myself lose to her!)
Years ago? Have you been stalking ~player~, Tharja?
Are you doing all this just because of some dream you had years ago, Tharja?
Stop being weird and just take it off already, Tharja.
(A spell?! I've got a bad feeling about this.)
Too bad your sandals don't seem to be catching ~player~'s interest very much, Tharja. But I guess they had to go eventually.
Did you just admit to cheating, Tharja?
Are you really cheating, Tharja? Please don't. That's no fun.
What kind of art class do you have, Ochako?
Sounds like one heck of an art class, Ochako.
A trainer? A different kind than I'm used to, but I think we can still get along.
(Maybe I should mix up my workout routine.) Hey Trainer! What time's do you hold your sessions again?
Hmm. That's a neat look for you, Juri. You look like you're ready to hop in the water at anytime!
I like that look, Juri. It's a lot like my outfit. That wasn't on purpose, was it?
Hmm. That's a neat look for you, Juri. You look like you're ready to hop in the water at anytime!
I like that look, Juri. It's a lot like my usual outfit. That wasn't on purpose, was it?
That's very nice beachwear, Monika. Very elegant!
Is that an inner tube? Do you not know how to swim, Sayaka? I could teach you if you want.
Sayaka, do you know how to swim? If not, I can help you out.
Hmmm, a swimsuit, a jacket, and sandals? Not bad, Zizou!
I like your summertime look, Zizou! It's pretty similar to mine!
Hmmm, a swimsuit, a jacket, and sandals? Not bad, Zizou!
I like your summertime look, Zizou! It's pretty similar to what I usually wear!
Is that swimsuit comfortable, Sheena? Because it really doesn't look like it is.
That swimsuit looks really tight, Sheena. Are you sure you're comfortable in that thing?
A tie!? That's so rare!
A tie!? That's like the shiny Pokemon of poker!
Now that I think about it, you don't see ties very often in Pokemon battles either.
So if it's a tie, then do both of you strip? No? Well then, let's move on.
Well, I haven't really lost anything major yet, so I can't really blame you for choosing something small.
I want to be upset, but I guess that I'm not really showing off anything either.
Well, as long as you take off something bigger next time, I'm fine with you just taking off your ~clothing~.
Yeah, I wasn't expecting anything too big to be honest. I'm still completely covered up, after all.
I'm sure we'll both take off bigger things as the game goes on.
Let's keep the game going. I want to see you take off more, ~name~.
Let's move on. It's the only way to make you take off something bigger, after all.
I'm not upset. Because, I'm sure it won't be the last time you lose.
You don't need your ~clothing~ right now anyway.
I've still got my swimsuit on, so I guess I can't really be mad.
I guess you had to get rid of your ~clothing~ at some point. Might as well be now.
I guess your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ a fair choice.
Wait! What's happening!?
Hold on. You ARE counting your glasses as an item? Then why didn't you take them off sooner?
Looks like her ability is Run Away.
A princess? That's pretty cool but, were you trying to do something just now?
Were you trying to make something happen just now, L'Arachel? It doesn't look like it worked.
You do remind me of a Pokemon from Galar called Wooloo, though!
You kinda remind me of a Mareep. Or a Wooloo!
Hmm? Nami? I think you dropped something.
Oh? What's that Nami?
Starting off with your armbands, Palutena? I guess that's a fair way to start.
I guess it makes sense for you to start with something small like your armbands, Palutena.
Your necklace. Of course you still have small things.
That's what I was expecting. Something else that's no fun.
Take off your belts and let's move on already.
Hurry it up so we can keep the game going, Palutena.
Well, you started with your shirt and skirt, so I guess I can't really complain about this.
You were already practically naked anyway, so I won't complain.
You're not being forced to do this, are you, Saki?
Hold on. Is someone forcing you to do this or something, Saki?
You've already taken off everything important, so okay.
I mean, after exposing your crotch and taking off your bra, I can't really complain about you taking off small stuff.
Whatever makes you feel comfortable, Twilight.
Whoa! She's glowing!?
This isn't a dark cave! You're supposed to use the other kind of Flash!
Try something?
What do you want to try, Monika?
No point in complaining about it. Onto the next round!
I'm not upset about it. You'll run out of small stuff soon.
Accessories can only protect you for so long. You'll see.
Let's keep going. Another set of cards, Dealer!
You can? Is it just a Dragon, or do you also have a secondary type?
You can? Hmm, I wonder what Lance would think about that.
Uuuuuh, what?
Can you say that again, Croix? In a way we can understand?
What just happened? What's with your skin, Alice? And what happened to your legs!?
Bags can always carry so much more than they look like they should. I gave up on trying to understand how a long time ago.
Oh. You're just taking off your ribbon. Fine then.
I wasn't planning on taking your hat! Calm down with the threats!
No one is going to take your hat! Stop threatening us!
Those glasses must be really special to you or something, Coco.
You either really love those shades, or you really want to win. Or both. Probably both.
I guess we're counting that as her stripping.
Hey, wasn't your hair blonde a second ago? You also seem a lot less angry.
I've seen a real Wooloo before. Apparently Galar has pretty strict border control.
I've never seen a Wooloo before. I'm not sure if Galar even lets them out of the region.
A pirate? Well, you don't seem like a bad person, Nami, so I guess we can just keep the game going.
You don't seem like a bad pirate, Nami. I once heard about these weird pirates from Hoenn, they were bad.
You better not think that's the last time you'll lose, Palutena!
Now, let's keep the game rolling! It's not over for you yet, Palutena!
Don't get cocky, Palutena! It's only just begun for you!
You're going to run out of small stuff, Palutena. Try to keep up your cocky attitude when that happens.
You've been pretty condescending for the whole game, Palutena. It makes it very not fun to play with you.
Why did you even bother coming to this game, Palutena?
If you're not going to play the game in a way that's fun then why are you even playing at all, Palutena?
I'm sure you're gonna take off something else big next time.
And now you just are naked!
Hm. Now that I think about it, you remind me a lot of this Fighting type gym leader from the Kalos region, Ribbon Girl.
If they are, then just say something, Saki. We might be able to help.
Don't be afraid to say something if you are, Saki. We could help.
Jeez, that was bright. Wait!! What happened to your clothes!? Is that even allowed!?
Aaand she's wearing a completely different outfit again.
I though that this was supposed to be a game of STRIP poker.
Are you actually going to take something off at any point?
What the? Wait! Are you a Bug-type trainer, Zizou?
Huh!? Were you wearing bugs just now, Zizou?
You said that was magic, right Zizou? Is there any particular reason why you have to make it look like bugs?
Okay. So it's magic. But why does it have to look like that?
Huh? Where'd they go?
What!? They're gone! Was that some sort of magic trick?
Your ~clothing~? I mean, I guess that makes sense.
I was kinda hoping for something more, but that's fine too.
Your ~clothing~ works for now.
Your ~clothing~ is a good choice.
Not bad, but I know you can do better.
I may not be able to see much, but I'm still liking what I see.
Getting rid of your ~clothing~ brings me one step closer to victory.
It's not by much, but I can definitely get a better view of your body now.
Taking off your ~clothing~, ~name~? You could do better, but I guess you could also do worse.
At least you're taking off something that actually covers you up a bit.
You're taking off your ~clothing~? Not a very big item, but it's fine.
Decided to take off your ~clothing~, ~name~? I guess I can see why.
You're not Psychic type? Then, are you just pure Dark?
Excuse me, did you just say 93rd birthday? How many times a year do you celebrate your birth?
I must have misheard you Mavis. I thought that you said 93rd birthday.
Someone's gonna get hurt if you keep doing this!
(And I thought Bullet Seed was annoying.)
Stop doing that! It's dangerous!
You're actually insane, aren't you?
Um, What? You're not making very much sense, Alice.
What are you talking about, Alice? I don't understand.
Stuff like that is why I don't work with Fire type Pokemon.
Oh. That's a towel. I thought it was some fancy skirt.
Are we really going to count a wrapped-up towel as a piece of clothing?
A plant wearing a sweater? Would that protect it from Ice type attacks?
That's a sweater? You must really be afraid of Ice type attacks, Leafy.
You're shaving?! Here and now?!
You're gonna do that here?! In front of all of us?
What are you talking about when you say that, Mae? Nightmare Feet?
Nightmare Feet? That sounds like it would be the name of an Ability. I wonder what it would do.
Well, you're already in your underwear, so I guess your stockings are the best choice.
I know your stockings are basically your only option, but it's kinda a shame to ruin the whole "matching striped set" you've got there, Mavis.
Oh. Your sandals. I guess I came wearing sandals too.
Your sandals? That's all? Fair enough, I guess.
Your stocking!? Are you just going to stall forever!?
A stocking!? Are you serious!? And why do you only have one!?
Just your shoes? Are you sure about that, Saki?
I honestly expected someone like you to be a bit more bold, Saki.
Are those tan lines, Sakura? They're quite apparent.
Are you wearing shorts beneath your skirt, Sakura? I thought I saw something green.
GAH! YOUR HEAD!?!
(I hope that ~player~ garners more interest in me than he does in her.)
(Hopefully my personality and fit body will make me more appealing to ~player~ than her.)
(As much as I hate to admit it, that was a really good line. I wonder if ~player~ got worked up over it.)
It doesn't sound like you intend on stopping, Tharja.
Even if you keep cheating, Tharja, we'll make sure that you don't win.
Your boots are all you have left, so time to take 'em off!
Let's get those boots out of here!
We can already see part of your bikini, so this really isn't a very big deal.
But, we could already see your bikini, Sayaka. The top of it, at least.
Now you're showing off just a little more skin, ~name~.
We'll get to the bigger things eventually.
It's not like that was the last time you'll lose after all.
You'd better not think that you're in the clear yet, ~name~.
The flower is a part of you? Does that work kinda like a Bulbasaur?
It's a part of your body? Does that help you in anyway, Alice?
Um, Clover? Why do you have all that stuff? And why were you hiding it?
What were you planning to do with all of that stuff, Clover?
So you really do have prosthetic legs. Not that I ever doubted you, Emi.
So that's what prosthetics look like.
Now that's a swimsuit, L'Arachel! And a very nice one at that!
Oh, now I see it! That's a very neat swimsuit, L'Arachel!
